AR 7. The undertaking shall consider the criteria for defining the status of water bodies according
to the relevant Annexes of Directive 2000/60/EC (Water Framework Directive) as well as the
guidance documents provided for implementation of the Water Framework Directive. The list
of guidance documents can be accessed under the European Commissionâ€™s Environment
